node.address: Playa Blanca, Calle larga c-09 , Baru Island, Colombia

content.value:
Hostal Lele beach offers a unique experience where you can find nice people, sea and nice and simple rooms where your nights on the beach will be unique and unforgettable. Interact with the hostel is a learning culture, beliefs, the signature of life of the locals and activities.

We are in the wonderful Caribbean Sea in Rosario Islands (island of Baru) with its beautiful beaches of sea of colors and with all that beauty we aim to be a sustainable destination, smart destination that will aims for good service and good relations between visitor and local.

We offer nice and comfortable rooms. Guest rooms at the guest house are equipped with a seating area. An American breakfast is available daily at Hostal brenelys. The accommodation offers a terrace. Isla Barú is 10 km from Hostal brenelys.

All rooms are equipped with a shared bathroom. You will find a a 24-hour front desk at the property. The area is popular for snorkeling and fishing. Cartagena de Indias is 21.3 km from Hostal Breneli, while Isla del Rosario is 21.6 km away.

description.description: Hostal Breneli offers pet-friendly accommodation in Barú. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar. Facing the beachfront in Baru, Hostal brenelys features a bar and a garden. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi. The guest house has family rooms.
